description: The Ski Bromont Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Ski Bromont for the snow report
Alexa, ask Ski Bromont for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Ski Bromont
shortDescription: The Ski Bromont Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Ski Bromont.
